reviews.review_msg: Bruno is one of the most helpful profs I have ever met. He is super passionate and knowledgable about the material. Yes, the topics can be a little complicated but he breaks them down super well and makes it really accessible. 10/10 would take again!

Amazing prof! Explains really clearly and gives super super helpful feedback on assignments. Grading and workload were reasonable, and bruno is really understanding, flexible, and caring. made the content really interesting!

An absolute dream of a professor. Lectures are engaging, Dr. King explains things super clearly and makes sure that everyone understands the content. She is encouraging during discussions and is open to hearing student perspectives and is super patient. She is a fair grader and is always willing to help in office hours. One of the best profs ever.
